mapper.update: update notice set readcnt = readcnt+1 where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select n.*, (select name from member m where m.id = n.writer) name from notice n where id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into notice (title, content, writer, filename, filepath) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, #{filename, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filepath, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select rownum no, n.*, (select name from member m where m.id = writer) name from (select * from notice order by id) n order by no desc
